column2: A gestalt of the countless thoughts that have been pulled into the Memverse. You feel like you're brimming with strength!
A gestalt of the countless thoughts that have been pulled into the Memverse. You feel like the world has your back!
A gestalt of the countless thoughts that have been pulled into the Memverse. You feel like nothing is out of reach!
A gestalt of the countless thoughts that have been pulled into the Memverse. You feel like you're everywhere at once!
A gestalt of the countless thoughts that have been pulled into the Memverse. You feel like luck is on your side this time!
A gestalt of the countless thoughts that have been pulled into the Memverse. With Pearl by your side, anything is possible!
